# NSDayCalendarUnit

**Type Property**

Specifies the day unit.

## Declaration

```swift
static var NSDayCalendarUnit: NSCalendar.Unit { get }
```

## Discussion

The corresponding value is an `NSInteger`. Equal to `kCFCalendarUnitDay`.
